Description: RARE+++ Early Soviet CHCHZ SEKONDA/MOLNIJA 3601 Slim Gents Oversized wristwatch 15 Jewels *SERVICED* Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous Extreme Rare Soviet Sekonda / Molnija Oversized Slim wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! It's made in 1962's in Russia, CCCP. If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! MOVEMENT : This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the high grade original pocket watch movement ''MOLNIJA'' with 15 ruby jewels. In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! Cyrillic signed that reads : '' 15 JEWELS 2-62 CHCHZ #693847 ''. See the photos for more details!!! CASE : This astonishing timepiece has Oversized Slim case! Made of chrome/nickel. Case converted from pocket watch!!! The case is in excellent cosmetic condition, no signs of any serious damages of time or use. The watch supplied with a brand new leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. The case have crown for winding and setting at 12 o'clock position. See the photos for more details!!! The large winding crown is in very good shape and operates properly! Diameter watch without the crown: 43 mm.Diameter watch with the crown: 46 mm.Thickness watch: 9 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! DIAL : This timepiece has original, iron dial. In good overall cosmetic condition, with some scratches. The dial has black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. The dial also is signed that reads : '' SEKONDA ''. The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new one, because old one was in very worse condition! See the photos for more details!!! Please ignore the camera reflection! FREE SHIPPING TO WORLDWIDE!!! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED! Please serious bidders only, bidders with 0 feedback please contact me before you bid. For the rest of the bidders if you need to clarify any doubts you may have, please contact me! Please see my other auctions from time to time when I list other beautiful timepieces/ items!!! Shipping charge is not refundable. Our goal is to make you a satisfied customer and we will do our best to make this happen. Exception is when it is our fault . Buyer pays return postage!!! Please do not hesitate to contact us for any questions you may have about your order or any of our products. We are here to help and we count on your satisfaction with our products.
